alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 01 at 12:37AM PST until January 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 60 mph expected. Local gusts at high elevations could reach 70 mph. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains
